<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0"><info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated></info><locale>
    <style-options punctuation-in-quote="true"/></locale><macro name="title">
    <text variable="title" quotes="true"/> 
  </macro><citation>
    <layout>
      <text value="bogus"/>
    </layout></citation><bibliography>
    <layout>
      <group delimiter=" ">
        <text macro="title" suffix="."/>
        <text value="Some text string"/>
      </group>
    </layout></bibliography></style>
result: “His Anonymous Chapter.” Some text string
